page.title: 10Energy,Entertainment,Events
page.content:
{Energy} Electricity is available to all. Mains gas is available to Kirton but most of Falkenham relies on Bottled gas.A pipe of gas imported at Felixstowe Docks runs under the area en route to Norwich. { {Entertainment} Occasional musical evenings are held in Falkenham Church.
{Events} An annual Strawberry tea, Market and Exhibition is held at Yew Tree House, Falkenham in aid of church funds. An annual Church fete is held in Kirton in July in aid of both churches. Other markets and Bygone exhibitions are held at Yew Tree House in aid of various charities.Both churches hold Harvest Suppers. Autumn Market held at Kirton Village Hall in aid of Falkenham church funds.
